## Ingredients

* 1 pounds of hamburger
* 1/2 cup of ketchup
* 2 Tbsp brown sugar
* 0.5 tsp of mustard
* 2 - 3 Tbsp of bbq sauce

## Directions

* Cook hamburger
* Mix condiments together
* Throw condiments in with hamburger, stir until heated through.
* Serve on buns
